name: Word Search Pop Great Fun
description:
Word Search: Great Fun is an exciting puzzle game for TRUE WORD geniuses! Concentrate to find all hidden words in given letters and connect them anyway you like to catch the word!
It starts off as an easy word game and becomes challenging! You will have fun improving your vocabulary and spelling skills. Your brain will thank you for the workout!
How to play?
- Fixed the flick of the alphabet horizontally, vertically, diagonally, forward or backward to create a particular hidden word
- Find as many words as possible to unlock levels and receive special bonus coins.
- Fill all the words in the blog! Get coins when you discover the star word.
- Is there a problem finding a word? You can use coins to buy hints to help level
